headline: New Sysco Solutions Partner, Square, Brings Time-Saving, Easy-To-Use Technology to More Restaurants
summary: Through the partnership, customers will receive a compelling processing fee rebate and hardware credits when enrolling through SyscoHOUSTON, Dec. 18, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Today, Sysco Corporation (NYSE:SYY), the world’s largest food distributor, announced a new partnership with Square to help restaurants of all sizes succeed and work smarter through powerful technology. Sysco supports its restaurant customers with a variety of services and offerings through its Sysco Restaurant Solutions pro
